meaningMnemonic: <radical>Flowers</radical> that are thought to be little <radical>tent</radical>s sent from <radical>heaven</radical> are <kanji>hollyhock</kanji>s. They're shaped almost like little teepees and would make the perfect tent for a faerie or a little yokai!
readingMnemonic: <kanji>Hollyhock</kanji>s are mostly <reading>あおい</reading> (blue) because they copy the color of the heavens, where they came from.
